Name: Tank Zombie Smasher
About the game: In Tank Zombie Smasher you control a tank on the insane speed, blowing up everything on your way and smashing zombies coming to you. This game puts you two tasks: to kill as many zombies as you can and survive as long as possible without crashing. When you collides with counter obstacles you'll lose health, so you need to go around or destroy them to survive. Features: * Colorful toon graphics * Endless traffic racing gameplay * The powerful background music and enjoyable effects
